column4: the only think stopping me from moving from Windows to Ubunu (as with many other people in South Africa) is that I cannot use my 3G phone as a Bluetooth modem
funny thing is if you go to the prompt and tell it to scan for DUN devices it shows my phones mac
I don't want to use it with USB
tthat really annoys me too (in my case a blackberry pearl)
I never did solve it (it's like the DUN profile isn't exposed when a Linux bluetooth stack is probing)
btw, you did do a scan from linux, right?
can you pastebin the output of your bt scan?
ah, you only have the one compter
well, can't really help you then
It does work (i've used it).. but it is tricky...
but agreed, they need to improve that for sure
